article.Heading: FMCG companies cheer GST rate cuts
article.Summary: India's top consumer goods companies expect the lowering of taxes by the goods and services tax (GST) Council to drive volumes going ahead. They are bullish on growth and recovery in the second half of FY18.
article.Body:
India's top consumer goods companies expect the lowering of taxes by the goods and services tax (GST) Council to drive volumes going ahead. They are bullish on growth and recovery in the second half of FY18.

Watch accompanying video of CNBC-TV18's Priya Sheth for a detailed report.
